About me

'Questions are answers'

My name is Channabasava Gola. I am a Data Analyst at Decision Theater and a graduate student at ASU in computer science. I am starting with writing short articles in the field of Data Science and Machine Learning which I learn from other sources. Hopefully you and me, both benefit from this.
